text: Mihov is a Bulgarian surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Ilian Mihov, Bulgarian economist * Ivan Mihov (born 1991), Bulgarian footballer * Valentin Mihov (born 1954), former Bulgarian footballer == See also == * Nikola Mikhov (1891–1945), regent of Bulgaria from 1943 to 1944 * Paskoje Miličević (Mihov) (ca. 1440–1516), Croatian architect == References == Category:Bulgarian-language surnames
title: Mihov
